item.title: Creating This Blog
item.description: What is Hugo? Hugo is a static site generator with fast building times. It allows for pages to be written as Markdown and compiles these documents down to html. The reason I choose this framework is that it is fast, under active development and written in Go, a language I really like. Install Hugo First install Hugo, for MacOS this can be done using homebrew: brew install hugo Create Website The Hugo Quickstart Guide gives commands to create an initial website called “blog”:
